docs.title: Cancellation Task Documentation
docs.text:
Hello and welcome to the cancellation task documentation!

This is where you can found out how to use and analyse cancellation task data within your own experiments!

[Contents]

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: This page will walk you through all the steps to get the cancellation task up and running on your own machine. We will first walk you through how to install the cancellation task software and analysis pipeline, and then we will walk you through each component of the software so you know the ins and outs of how things work. The program is designed to work without any need to change the code, however if you spot an issue please do report it on the github page.
